医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
老年人在癌症治疗后面临更高的 CVD 风险接受癌症治疗的老年人患心血管疾病的风险是未患癌症的老年人的两倍。转移性癌症、血液癌和肺癌患者的风险最高，尤其是化疗后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Older-adults-face-higher-CVD-risk-post-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Older-adults-face-higher-CVD-risk-post-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d4f16a2-29b3-4b21-ac74-9dae81c9d0df Wed, 25 Sep 2024 20:47:00 -0400 Older adults face higher CVD risk post-cancer treatment
H5N1 禽流感正在快速变异并传染给哺乳动物——下一次大流行可能就在这里吗？研究人员揭示了 H5N1 病毒如何通过基因重排和特定突变迅速适应哺乳动物，引发了人们对潜在大流行风险的担忧。来自水貂、海洋哺乳动物和奶牛的证据表明哺乳动物之间存在传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/H5N1-bird-flu-is-mutating-fast-and-jumping-to-mammals-could-the-next-pandemic-be-here.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/H5N1-bird-flu-is-mutating-fast-and-jumping-to-mammals-could-the-next-pandemic-be-here.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ca852ca-863a-416b-8bae-9be7ef0fb1fd Wed, 25 Sep 2024 20:29:00 -0400 H5N1 bird flu is mutating fast and jumping to mammals - could the next pandemic be here?
新的人工智能工具彻底改变了罕见疾病的药物发现全球有超过 7,000 种罕见和未确诊的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/New-AI-tool-revolutionizes-drug-discovery-for-rare-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/New-AI-tool-revolutionizes-drug-discovery-for-rare-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5c4643a-f95d-4188-bf07-a831784db237 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 15:34:37 -0400 New AI tool revolutionizes drug discovery for rare diseases
世卫组织发布新指南以加强全球临床试验世界卫生组织 (WHO) 今天发布了改进各种收入水平国家临床试验的设计、实施和监督的指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/WHO-issues-new-guidance-to-enhance-clinical-trials-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/WHO-issues-new-guidance-to-enhance-clinical-trials-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb664070-2d9c-4028-b1c2-dc62dcf15e70 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 15:33:28 -0400 WHO issues new guidance to enhance clinical trials worldwide
高身体圆度指数与心血管疾病风险增加相关根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》（开放获取期刊）上的一项新研究，45 岁以上成年人在 6 年内拥有较高的身体圆度指数 (BRI) 与患心血管疾病的风险增加相关。 ，美国心脏协会的同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/High-body-roundness-index-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/High-body-roundness-index-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20c1ba26-ce3e-4254-a454-2e8e3b0a0f65 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 15:17:54 -0400 High body roundness index linked to increased cardiovascular disease risk
较高剂量的丁丙诺啡与阿片类药物使用障碍的急诊就诊率较低有关与成人相比，患有阿片类药物使用障碍的成人接受较高剂量的阿片类药物成瘾治疗药物丁丙诺啡，随后前往急诊室就诊或使用与行为健康（例如心理健康和药物滥用障碍）相关的住院服务的风险可能较低根据美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助的一项分析，接受推荐剂量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Higher-doses-of-buprenorphine-linked-to-lower-emergency-visits-in-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Higher-doses-of-buprenorphine-linked-to-lower-emergency-visits-in-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd2801d3-c2e4-4b32-bb44-4d2ac8c32c35 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 14:38:03 -0400 Higher doses of buprenorphine linked to lower emergency visits in opioid use disorder
国际研究倡议旨在改善女性心血管护理美国心脏协会作为全球领先的专注于所有人心脏和大脑健康的非营利组织，庆祝其救生服务 100 周年，并与世界各地其他顶级心血管研究资助者一起，支持一项专注于女性心血管健康的国际科学研究拨款。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/International-research-initiative-aims-to-improve-cardioangio-care-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/International-research-initiative-aims-to-improve-cardioangio-care-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0757039-1a02-4139-93d6-f473dc5acc9d Wed, 25 Sep 2024 14:33:02 -0400 International research initiative aims to improve cardiovascular care for women
CRISPR-Cas13 成为 RNA 靶向疗法的游戏规则改变者近年来，科学界在基因编辑领域取得了重大进展，特别是通过 CRISPR（成簇规则间隔短回文重复序列）系统的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/CRISPR-Cas13-emerges-as-a-game-changer-in-RNA-targeted-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/CRISPR-Cas13-emerges-as-a-game-changer-in-RNA-targeted-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6745be2a-f231-4eea-b4bf-a6f38977208e Wed, 25 Sep 2024 14:30:58 -0400 CRISPR-Cas13 emerges as a game changer in RNA-targeted therapies
匹兹堡大学获得 1 亿美元资金用于加强创伤护理研究匹兹堡大学健康科学学院已从美国国防部 (DOD) 获得约 1 亿美元拨款，用于继续推进创伤护理的临床研究项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/University-of-Pittsburgh-receives-24100-million-to-enhance-trauma-care-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/University-of-Pittsburgh-receives-24100-million-to-enhance-trauma-care-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4aadb9e-81bf-48dc-b3f5-24b248360be7 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 14:25:48 -0400 University of Pittsburgh receives $100 million to enhance trauma care research
化学遗传学揭示了有前景的抗新冠化合物《药学报 B》的这篇新文章讨论了通过化学遗传学鉴定新型 SARS-CoV-2 小分子抑制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Chemical-genics-uncovers-promising-anti-COVID-compounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240925/Chemical-genics-uncovers-promising-anti-COVID-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c53c7bc-d3fb-487a-a932-ca0f4b2ecf34 Wed, 25 Sep 2024 13:33:26 -0400 Chemical genetics uncovers promising anti-COVID compounds
